description: This file defines the main application component for a Tic Tac Toe game built using React, managing the game state and rendering the UI.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner by checking all possible winning combinations.

methods.name: getAvailableMoves
methods.description: Returns an array of available moves by checking which squares are empty.

methods.name: computerMove
methods.description: Simulates a computer player's move by randomly selecting an available square.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles the click event for a square, updating the game state accordingly.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.
